title: How do I get passed a Google account lock I just bought this phone used as a Christmas present
content: I just got this phone used its reset but it's apparently locked to a Google account it's supposed to be a present for my dad he's still on a blackberry it was my last bit of cash I didn't realize that it was going to put me into this I didn't realize that it was going to be locked out ðŸ˜­
